cv_builder_get_started: Let’s help you build your CV
need_to_know: Here’s what you need to know
lorem_dummy: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur. Eget viverra nunc sapien tortor dignissim pellentesque dignissim quis at. Ut id placerat amet in dictum. Amet nunc faucibus sapien ultrices
manage_cv_application: Manage your CV and job application
employment_history_text: You can edit and delete employment summary
education_history_text: Provide details of your educational background
other_work_experience: Do you have any other work experience?
skip_awards_prompt: Awards are known to boost a candidates CV. Are you sure you want to skip?
email_tip: Do not use funny emails such as datbeauty@gmail.com or babygirl254@gmail.com. Simply create a professional email with your name.
phone_tip: Type in your phone number including country code such as +1 or +44 or +234
spoken_lang_tip: What languages do you speak? for example English,Spanish, Malay, Swahili
profession_tip: Be specific about your profession, for example Accountant, Program Manager, Product Designer
desc_company_tip: Add a powerful description of the company including their annual revenue and number of users.
goal_company_tip: Describe how your role contributed to the company's goal. It should not be more than 3 sentences, keep it short and powerful
add_project_tip: List out the top 3 projects/tasks you worked at the company. Use this format: {Name of project or tasks} whose goal is to {add the goals} (this should not be more than 1 sentence, keep it short and powerful
add_impact_tip: List out your top 3 impacts/achievements in this role. You can use this format: Successfully {add achievement, see examples below, use numbers to communicate impact} (this should not be more than 1 sentence, keep it short and powerful)
personal_summary_tip: Avoid using buzz words such as I am hardworking, collaborative and looking for a job. Anyone can say that and it doesn’t say much about who you are and what you have achieved. The Personal Summary is an opportunity to sell yourself in a powerful paragraph'. Should not be more than 500 characters
highlight: Here's the highlight for the day!
graph_show: Graph Showing Job Views Will Appear Here
